bibl.title: The Petra Papyri. IV

series.title: American Center of Oriental Research Publications.

bibl.note: P. Petra IV, 37-49. - Preface and Acknowledgments (Barbara A. Lehtinen); - Map of Byzantine Province of Palaestina Tertia Salutaris. - [Texts] 37-49. - Index to Volumes I, III and IV (T.P.). - Introduction to the Plates (M.B.). - Concordance.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Petra IV 145.4 P. Petra I; III

Arjava Antti, Matias Buchholz, Traianos Gagos † and Maarit Kaimio, with contributions by Jorma Kaimio, Clement A. Kuehn, and Tiina Purola, and plates prepared by Maija Holappa and Vesa Vahtikari, The Petra Papyri. IV. (American Center of Oriental Research Publications. 6.)
Amman, Jordan, American Center of Oriental Research, 2011, 4°, xx-293 pp., 1 tabl., 1 carte, figg. 74 pll. ISBN 978-9957-8543-5-5. $100.

P. Petra IV, 37-49. - Preface and Acknowledgments (Barbara A. Lehtinen); - Map of Byzantine Province of Palaestina Tertia Salutaris. - [Texts] 37-49. - Index to Volumes I, III and IV (T.P.). - Introduction to the Plates (M.B.). - Concordance.
